mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.amount AS "amount", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.bank_account AS "bankAccount", a.bank_account_name AS "bankAccountName", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.check_status AS "checkStatus", m.nickname as "userName", u.mobile as "userMobile"
left join member_info m on m.id = a.user_id left join sys_user u on u.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commission_take_out( id, user_id, amount, create_date, bank_account, bank_account_name, bank_name, check_status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{amount}, #{createDate}, #{bankAccount}, #{bankAccountName}, #{bankName}, #{checkStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE commission_take_out SET user_id = #{userId}, amount = #{amount}, create_date = #{createDate}, bank_account = #{bankAccount}, bank_account_name = #{bankAccountName}, bank_name = #{bankName}, check_status = #{checkStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
